---
title: "DNAnexus trial "
output: html_notebook
---

load packages
```{r}
install.packages("esquisse")
install.packages("plotly")
install.packages("flexdashboard")
install.packages("DT")

library(tidyverse)
library(esquisse)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(DT)
```

load data
```{r}
trial.dataset <- read_csv("combined datasets.csv")
trial.dataset
```

Clean data
```{r}
trial.dataset.clean <- trial.dataset %>%
 filter(Group %in% "UKBB")
```


Visualisation 
```{r}
ggplot(trial.dataset.clean) +
  aes(
    x = hypertension,
    y = age_at_last_follow_up,
    fill = atrial_fibrillation
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()
```


Interactive visualisation 
```{r}
graph <- ggplot(trial.dataset.clean) +
  aes(
    x = hypertension,
    y = age_at_last_follow_up,
    fill = atrial_fibrillation
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(graph)
```
